summary: A Caucasian monk in Shanghai infiltrates the underworld to find the killers of his spiritual female Grandmaster.
cast: David Carradine|Daryl Hannah|Jimmy Taenaka|Kay Tong Lim|Yu Beng Lim|Osric Chau|Christian Lee|Yan Wu Yan|Pei-Pei Cheng|Gary Peterman|Nic Rhind|Rosalind Pho|Vasilios E.|Yin Long Han|Nolan Willard|Gilbert Kupsami|James Z. Feng|Xiao Yong Li|Luo Cai Xia|Anya|Ling Yun Bai|Karen Bergen|Li-Tong Hsu|Jun Cheng Hong|Betty Zhou
title: Las crónicas de la Grulla Blanca
